parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.58

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Briefing

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Attach type to the simple task. See [[Arma_3_Tasks_Overhaul#Default_Task_Types:_Actions|Default Task Types]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> task '''setSimpleTaskType''' taskType

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> task: [[Task]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> taskType: [[String]] - Type of task

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>([[currentTask]] [[player]]) [[setSimpleTaskType]] "attack";</code>

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[taskType]], [[currentTask]], [[setSimpleTaskCustomData]], [[taskCustomData]], [[Arma_3_Tasks_Overhaul#Default_Task_Types:_Actions|Default Task Types]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">
<comment><!-- BEGIN Note Section -->
</comment><comment><!-- For example:
<dd class="notedate">Posted on Month Day, Year - Time (UTC)</dd>

-->
</comment><comment><!-- END Note Section -->
</comment></dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
